task.title: Fix continuity parser to handle markdown content

events.content: Increased WebSocket log history from 200 to 5000 lines: Increased WebSocket log history from 200 to 5000 lines

raw.question: Increased WebSocket log history from 200 to 5000 lines
raw.chosen: Increased WebSocket log history from 200 to 5000 lines
raw.reasoning: Root cause: server.ts line 1632 only sent 200 lines on WebSocket connect. xterm scrollback (10000) and pty buffer (10000) were fine. Fixed by increasing getWorkerOutput limit to 5000 (half of max buffer).

retrospective.summary: Fixed XTermLogViewer scrollback by increasing WebSocket initial history from 200 to 5000 lines in server.ts:1632
